Title: Vara: A Blessing
Writer: Sunil Gangopadhyay (short story), Khyentse Norbu (screenplay), Khyentse Norbu
Actors: Shahana Goswami, Swaroopa Ghosh, Rohit Raj, Mohamed Adamaly
Plot: In rural India, a young woman named LILA and her mother VINATA, a temple dancer wed to a Hindu god, find themselves on the fringes of society, struggling to make ends meet.
